update_title: Aider v0.74.0 - Dynamic Context Window and Enhanced Model Support
description: Aider v0.74.0 introduces dynamic Ollama context window adjustment, improved support for o3-mini, DeepSeek V3 & R1, and o1-series models via secondary API providers. The release removes specific markdown tags from R1 responses for cleaner commit messages, adds temperature control in model settings, and includes Docker container improvements. Key bugfixes address filename creation, timeout handling, and file watching performance to better handle large project structures.

update_title: Aider v0.73.0 - o3-mini Support and Reasoning Effort Control
description: Aider v0.73.0 adds full support for OpenAI's o3-mini model accessible via 'aider --model o3-mini', introduces a new --reasoning-effort argument with low/medium/high settings, and improves context window handling with better messaging. The release includes support for removing model-specific reasoning tags, auto-creation of parent directories, and DeepSeek R1 free access via OpenRouter. Significant improvements to R1 error handling and turn order enforcement make the tool more robust.

description: Aider v0.72.0 introduces support for DeepSeek R1 model with a convenient '--model r1' shortcut and OpenRouter integration. The release adds Kotlin syntax support to the repo map, implements --line-endings file writing option, and improves GPT-4o benchmark scores with enhanced system message handling. Bugfixes address turn taking during reflection, Docker image permissions, read-only file handling, and Unicode error fallbacks.

update_title: Cursor 1.0 - BugBot, Background Agent GA, and Memories
description: Cursor reaches version 1.0 with major releases including BugBot for automatic PR code review, general availability of Background Agent for remote parallel task execution, Jupyter Notebook agent support, and the introduction of Memories for project-specific context retention. The update brings one-click MCP server installation with OAuth support, richer chat responses with Mermaid diagrams and tables, and a completely redesigned dashboard with usage analytics. Max mode expands to Gemini 2.5 Flash.

update_title: Simplified Pricing and Background Agent Preview
description: Cursor introduces unified request-based pricing replacing the previous complex pricing structure, Max Mode token-based pricing for all top models, and a new Tab model capable of suggesting multi-file changes. Background Agent enters preview mode allowing parallel agent execution in remote environments. The update adds @folders support for full codebase context inclusion, refreshed Inline Edit UI with agent integration options, multi-root workspace support, and chat export/duplication features.
